オプション1:
Star Man arrived at the ruins.
When he went to Trapezoid Man, the kids were there too.
After thinking a moment, Star Man began talking about what happened at the port ruins.

"There was an enormous, fat ghost and a skin‑and‑bones man.
The skinny one kept laughing the whole time—he was creepy.
He laughed and said he'd kill me and my parents because we're ***."
"He laughed so hard he couldn't stand and ended up collapsing onto the ground."
"Hahaha, what's with that guy? Kinda funny."
"That's Nes. And the ghost was Noble."
"Now that you mention it—haven't met Vim either."
"I hear they can live without eating."
(Maybe I should go to See Poroporo.)
